DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Intervention Trial Healthy Chinese
DOC.detailed_description: Recent epidemiological study suggest serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] concentration ≥75 nmol/L appear optimal prevent cardiometabolic disease improve bone health . To achieve goal , daily intake 1000 IU equivalent amount source , need , twice much RDA recommend Chinese Nutrition Society . Meanwhile , epidemiological evidence show large proportion Chinese may suffer vitamin D insufficiency deficiency whereas current RDA China might low provide adequate vitamin D people 's health . In order fill gap , therefore , essential determine dose-response dos vitamin D3 supplement raise serum level 25 ( OH ) D also dose vitamin D3 require achieve circulate 25 ( OH ) D ≥ 75 nmol/L.Ultimately , current study provide important evidence establish optimal vitamin D requirement Chinese people
DOC.criteria: Age : 2045 year . vitamin D deficiency ( 25 ( OH ) D < 50 nmol/l ) BMI < 18.5 kg/m2 , BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 Total intake calcium diet supplement > 1200mg/d , fast serum calcium level ≥2.75 mmol/l Participating clinical study within previous 3 month Taking vitamin D supplement within previous 3 month Using medication may affect vitamin D metabolism previous 3 month ; Concomitant clinical condition , like liver dysfunction ( serum alanine transaminase ( ALT ) ≥40 U/L ; and/or aspartate transaminase ( AST ) ≥40 U/L ; Glutamyl transpeptidase （GGT）≥50 U/L ; serum creatinine < 50 > 120 µmol/L ; urea nitrogen ( UN ) < 7 > 18 mg/dl , and/or urine acid < 90 > 420 µmol/L ; may affect vitamin D metabolism ; History drug alcohol abuse ( > 40 g/d ) Women pregnancy lactation Individuals mental disorder current use antidepressant , condition may affect understand unwillingness intervention ; Having clinically diagnose AIDS , hepatitis A , hepatitis B , tuberculosis infectious disease .
